column4: ok, i was able to install wine and configure it using sidetool, or something like that, and i got IE, how do i use IE now? where can i find it? please help, thanks
it never occured to me to try and run something as crappy as ie on linux ... so i can't help unfortunately, i would tell ya if i knew.  i'm curious what your reason for running it on linux might be?
i dont know if its activex, can you check it for me? http://www.eritesting.com/q/perception.dll?login=ERI
